title: Ghost Stories of E Nesbitt
description:
Edith Nesbitt is best known as a children's author, but she also wrote for adults. These are five of her ghost stories:

01 The Shadow

Three girls are told a late night tale of evil, the tragic ending of which is too close to home
 
02 John Charrington's Wedding

A man is determined not to miss his own wedding, at any cost.

03 The Violet Car

A nurse is summoned to a farm to help a vulnerable patient, only to encounter a couple slowly descending into madness. 

04 Man Size in Marble

Newly-weds find the cottage of their dreams, but the previous evil (and dead) owners threaten to return.

05 The Ebony Frame

A man inherits a property containing an unusual portrait of a woman - one which threatens to change his life forever.
